lead_paragraph: A buccaneer in a smoking jacket, a Rastafarian in a body suit of brilliant color, and a man dressed as a demonic marmot all gyrated to the interplanetary vibrations as the 14-piece band snaked a cosmic conga line through the crowd, bedecked in Egyptian headdresses and spangly regalia.
snippet: For Sun Ra's ghost band, every night is Halloween.

headline.main: No Need to Dress Any Differently

abstract: For Sun Ra's ghost band, every night is Halloween.
